trans-unit.source: Add a value to a resource tag
trans-unit.target: Add a value to a resource tag

trans-unit.source: Add a value to the specified resource tag.
trans-unit.target: Add a value to the specified resource tag.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="87a737b2-9cfd-454a-81cc-4eb43a81fc94#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to resource tags.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="87a737b2-9cfd-454a-81cc-4eb43a81fc94#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to resource tags.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: PUT
trans-unit.target: PUT

trans-unit.source: Replace {tag-name} with the name of the tag to which you want to add a value.
trans-unit.target: Replace {tag-name} with the name of the tag to which you want to add a value.

trans-unit.source: Replace {tag-value} with the value that you want to add to the resource tag.
trans-unit.target: Replace {tag-value} with the value that you want to add to the resource tag.

trans-unit.source: A tag value can have a maximum of 256 characters and is case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A tag value can have a maximum of 256 characters and is case sensitive.

trans-unit.source: Set the <parameterReference>ContentLength</parameterReference> header to 0.
trans-unit.target: Set the <parameterReference>ContentLength</parameterReference> header to 0.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: Status code: 201
trans-unit.target: Status code: 201

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: id
trans-unit.target: id

trans-unit.source: Specifies the identifying URL of the resource tag value.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the identifying URL of the resource tag value.

trans-unit.source: tagValue
trans-unit.target: tagValue

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value that is assigned to the resource tag.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the value that is assigned to the resource tag.

trans-unit.source: count
trans-unit.target: count

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of resources that are assigned a resource tag with this value.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of resources that are assigned a resource tag with this value.

trans-unit.source: The value for the type element is always <languageKeyword>Total</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: The value for the type element is always <languageKeyword>Total</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: When a tag is initially created and has no associated resources, the value of the value element is 0.
trans-unit.target: When a tag is initially created and has no associated resources, the value of the value element is 0.

trans-unit.source: The value element specifies the number of resources that are assigned to the tag.
trans-unit.target: The value element specifies the number of resources that are assigned to the tag.

trans-unit.source: When a tag is initially created and has no associated resources, this value is 0.
trans-unit.target: When a tag is initially created and has no associated resources, this value is 0.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: To add a value to a tag, you must first create the tag.
trans-unit.target: To add a value to a tag, you must first create the tag.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1ba53304-bde1-4c68-a897-bcd2af42911b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a resource tag</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1ba53304-bde1-4c68-a897-bcd2af42911b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a resource tag</link>.
